overview: Bill co-founded Fisher Capital in 1991. Prior to starting Fisher Capital, he specialized in highly-leveraged corporate lending, mergers and acquisitions, and business restructurings for Banque Paribas and Bank of America. Bill currently serves as Chairman of the Board for Value Financial Services, a specialty retail and consumer finance company located in Orlando, Florida. He also sits on the Board of Directors of CartaSite Inc. and Center for Transportation Safety. Bill holds degrees in both finance and chemical engineering from the University of Colorado at Boulder. When he isnâ€™t spending time with his wife and six children, he enjoys skiing, hiking and golfing.
